    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AmountOfPlayersView
    View for selecting the number of players.
    AmountOfPlayersViewController
    Controller for dealing with the number of player selections.
    BackToStartAction
    This class represents an action that sends a player back to a specified tile on the board.
    Board
    Represents a game board that contains tiles.
    BoardConfigLoader
    This class is responsible for loading the board configuration from a JSON file.
    BoardConfigLoader.TileConfig
    Static inner class to represent the configuration of a tile.
    BoardGame
    The BoardGame class represents a board game with a board, players, and dice.
    BoardGameApp
    Main class for the board game.
    BoardGameFactory
    Simple factory for creating different types of BoardGame.
    BoardGameObserver
    Observer interface for board game.
    BoardGameView
    This view displays the board game with a grid of tiles, ladders, and snakes.
    BoardGameView.Observer
    Observer for user actions on the board game screen.
    BoardGameViewController
    Controller for the boardgame screen.
    BoardNotInitializedException
    Exception thrown when the game board is not initialized.
    BoardTest
     
    Dice
    The Dice class represents a collection of dice.
    DiceTest
     
    Die
    Represents a die with a specified number of sides.
    DieTest
     
    FullscreenHandler
    Handles fullscreen mode for the application.
    GameType
    Enum representing the types of games available.
    InvalidDiceRollException
    Exception thrown when the dice roll is invalid.
    InvalidGameTypeException
    Exception thrown when the game type is invalid.
    InvalidTileException
    Exception thrown when the tile is invalid.
    LadderAction
    This class represents an action that sends a player back to a specified tile on the board.
    MainView
    Main application class that starts the board game selection.
    MainViewController
    MainViewController is responsible for handling the main view of the game.
    PieceImageLoader
    Utility class to load and cache images for game pieces.
    Player
    This class represents a player in the game.
    PlayerInputRow
    A row in the player input form.
    PlayerRecord
    Class that represents a player record with a name and a piece.
    PlayerView
    PlayerView class allows users to enter player names and select game pieces.
    PlayerView.Observer
    Observer interface for handling events in the PlayerView.
    PlayerView.PlayerData
    Static class for the data of the players that is used in the playerview class.
    PlayerViewController
    Controller for the player view screen.
    Questions
    Represents a question in the game.
    QuizGameView
    QuizGameView class represents the graphical user interface for a quiz game.
    QuizGameView.Observer
    Observer interface for handling game events.
    QuizGameViewController
    Controller for the quiz game view.
    ReadFromCSV
    Class that reads player records from a CSV file.
    SaveToCSV
    Class that saves player records to a CSV file.
    Tile
    Represents a tile on the game board.
    TileAction
    This interface represents an action that can be performed on a tile in the game.
